channel.title: [REL] Soulreaper's/Danielplanto's Item-Recolorer [REL]
channel.description:
Hi, I am Soulreaper-Danielplanto: Owner of Reaper Scape, and I made a program to take make you items on specification of what color you want them. I would like you guys to use it :) it is a great program, you type in the number for what category you want, and then you will be asked a couple questions like: What ID do you want the item to have? What color do you want your Helm to be? or whatever, type in one of the colors from the colornames file i made for you guys, or check them out inside of it with the option, colornames. Then you will be asked to fill in its Name and Examine info, its pretty easy to follow, so... lol. anyway, here is an image for you guys!
[img]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x468/soulreaper19941/Picture2ofREC.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i1183.photobucket.com/albums/x468/soulreaper19941/Picture1ofREC.jpg[/img]\
I forgot to add this... A couple ppl worked on this: 1. Friend helped me get all coords (or most) 2. Friend gave me all the Interface numbers 3. Me for creating it and making it easy to use. 97% me and 3% friends.
Here is another link:
[URL=http://uppit.com/o88rff7i7po4/Soulreaper's_Item_Recolorer.zip]Soulreaper's Item Recolorer.zip - 15 Kb[/URL]

item.title: [REL] Soulreaper's/Danielplanto's Item-Recolorer [REL]
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

I Vain I:

There are plenty of item recolorers, generarors, int makers, and other shit in Z 0 D I A C’s releases.

Well I didnt know, im soooorrrrryyy, I just wanted to make and release something to help people for once…

Read full topic
